import React, { useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import getItemDetail from '../services/getItemDetail' export default function ProductDetail({ProductId} = ""){ const [product, setProduct] = useState({}); useEffect(function(){ getItemDetail({ProductId}) .then(x => setProduct(x.item)) },[]); return

{product.condition = 'new' ? 'Nuevo' : 'Usado'} - {product.sold_quantity} vendidos

{product.title}

{product.price ? ${product.price.amount}{product.price.decimals} : ''}

Descripci√≥n del producto

{product.description}

}
